sentences.sContent: You can peacefully send her on to the next life.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can peacefully send her on to the next life.
sentences.sCn: 你可以心情平静地把卡西送往另一个世界。

sentences.sContent: We want to get to Western standards of living, but to do it all peacefully.
sentences.sContent_eng: We want to get to Western standards of living, but to do it all peacefully.
sentences.sCn: 我们希望达到西方的生活标准，但是一切要和平地进行。

words.tran: 和平的，爱好和平的；平静的
